QuestData.Title: Power Unearthed
QuestData.Description: What power could reduce a village to ashes in the blink of an eye? The Adherents claim it is the will of Rukhmar.$B$BA lie, obviously.$B$BThey did nothing to earn such power - in truth, they stumbled upon it rather unwittingly, in a hole in the ground.$B$BCome and visit me near the excavation site just west of here. We must understand their technology if we are to defeat it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Darkscryer Raastok near the Apexis Excavation.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Darkscryer Raastok near the Apexis Excavation.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah yes, you've arrived just in time.
